title: anyone know what this font is? looks like its inspired by saul bass
content:
if anyone can suggest what this font is or something close that would be awesome

[http://www.jonburke.ca/images/uploads/work-item/35/identity-toronto-afte...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404131140/http:/www.jonburke.ca/images/uploads/work-item/35/identity-toronto-afterdark.jpg "http://www.jonburke.ca/images/uploads/work-item/35/identity-toronto-afterdark.jpg")

thanks  
B

author: djbaz

comments.content: Note how all the identical letters look completely different. As such, odds are this was hand lettered (and nicely done, at that)

Agree with Darrel. Definitely hand-drawn. This kind of type treatment is known as "interlock". Having a look to fonts [tagged as it](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404131140/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Ainterlock) at MyFonts might be helpful: Sinzano, Mister Sirloin, Darkheart, Master of Poster, Croteau...
